mapper.sql: ID, CFG_CFG0_UID, CFG_BOMLINE_UID, FL_CFG_CREATE_DATE, FL_CFG_UPDATE_DATE, FL_CFG_CREATOR, FL_CFG_UPDATOR, FL_CFG_BOMLINE_NAME, FL_CFG_VERSION, FL_OPERATION_TYPE, FL_COMMENT
mapper.select:
select
from HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD where FL_CFG_VERSION = (select ID from HZ_FULL_CFG_MAIN_RECORD where PROJECT_UID = #{projectId}) and CFG_CFG0_UID is not null

select
from HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD where CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{bomLineId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD t left join Hz_Cfg0_Record t2 on t.cfg_cfg0_uid=t2.puid where CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{cfgBomlineUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD t left join Hz_Cfg0_Record t2 on t.cfg_cfg0_uid=t2.puid left join Hz_Bom_Line_Record t3 on t.cfg_bomline_uid=t3.puid where CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{cfgBomlineUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD
ID,
CFG_CFG0_UID,
CFG_BOMLINE_UID,
FL_CFG_CREATE_DATE,
FL_CFG_UPDATE_DATE,
FL_CFG_CREATOR,
FL_CFG_UPDATOR,
FL_CFG_BOMLINE_NAME,
FL_CFG_VERSION,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{cfgCfg0Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cfgBomlineUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flCfgCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flCfgUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flCfgCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flCfgUpdator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flCfgBomlineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flCfgVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD
CFG_CFG0_UID = #{cfgCfg0Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{cfgBomlineUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FL_CFG_CREATE_DATE = #{flCfgCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FL_CFG_UPDATE_DATE = #{flCfgUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FL_CFG_CREATOR = #{flCfgCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FL_CFG_UPDATOR = #{flCfgUpdator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FL_CFG_BOMLINE_NAME = #{flCfgBomlineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FL_CFG_VERSION = #{flCfgVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD set CFG_CFG0_UID = #{cfgCfg0Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{cfgBomlineUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FL_CFG_CREATE_DATE = #{flCfgCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FL_CFG_UPDATE_DATE = #{flCfgUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FL_CFG_CREATOR = #{flCfgCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FL_CFG_UPDATOR = #{flCfgUpdator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FL_CFG_BOMLINE_NAME = #{flCfgBomlineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FL_CFG_VERSION = #{flCfgVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD set CFG_CFG0_UID = #{cfgCfg0Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FL_COMMENT = #{flComment, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{cfgBomlineUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ( (select ID from HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD where CFG_CFG0_UID = #{cfgCfg0Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) is NULL or (select CFG_CFG0_UID from HZ_FULL_CFG_WITHCFG_RECORD where CFG_BOMLINE_UID = #{cfgBomlineUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) = #{cfgCfg0Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
